name: Bungee Kit
description: You can use it to bypass BungeeCord protections. Recommend use it in SandBox. Pretty outdated for right now.
author: VoxelHax

name: MCCMDLOGGER
description: You can use it on server or your machine. It redirect to original or target server, then logs chat messages and commands, i.e server poison tool.
author: VoxelHax

name: Roblox FPS Unlocker
description: Unlocks FPS for Roblox. Right now outdated and replaced by Bloxstrap & Roblox setting, you can use it only for unlock Roblox Studio
author: Axstin

name: RoShade
description: Old shaders for roblox, right now useless.
author: bituq & Zeal

name: Cheat Engine
description: Tool to edit Games Memory (Standart Search, AntiRandomizer, SpeedHack, etc)
author: Big community

name: Theia
description: Java malware analyzer. Can be used to search backdoors in minecraft hacked clients. Have Opened source code.
author: TigerMouthBear

name: MCP Tool
description: Open source Minecraft multi-tool made for pentesting. You need to build it yourself. Read How-To-Install.txt file

name: Open Buckloit
description: Contiunation of Buckloit. Plugin backdoor injector. Support custom exploits.
author: VoxelHax

name: Starlight
description: Custom launcher for RBX. Right now is in Archive.
author: Originally by RealNickk, UI by CatsPnewed

name: Pack Recolor Tool
description: This is a really efficient and underrated tool. Essentially this tool allows you to change the colour of any texture pack to a colour of your choice in just a few seconds, without having to edit ever resource texture with a tool like paint.net. This tool was found on one discord server, and I think that it is need to be posted there..
author: DragonDoodler

name: SRC Checker
description: Checks source code of hacked clients (java & kotlin), like theia
author: Nyvil

name: BloxStrap
description: An open-source, feature-packed alternative bootstrapper for Roblox. Something like Starlight Launcher, but it has UI.
author: pizzabloxer

name: Discord Token Protector
description: Protect your Discord token from malicious grabbers! Please read all information, before using it.
author: andro2157

name: Recaf
description: Recaf is an open-source Java bytecode editor that simplifies the process of editing compiled Java applications.
author: Community

name: Smoothie
description: Mootion blur utility, best for adding motion blur to gameplay. Successor of tecno's blur.
author: Couleur Tweak Tips community
